website_summaries.verdict: A great price for a unique and versatile dry board. Use it as is, or cut it into various sizes to fit your needs.
pros: Gets top marks for being thin and flexible, which is unusual in a dry erase board
Erases well, and the magnetic surface works great
Comes in a sturdy, reusable tube
cons: You need to make sure the surface you mount this on is absolutely flat, as any blemish will show up on the dry board
Pens are low quality, and the caps can be hard to get off them

customer_reviews.title: I am really satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: I am really satisfied with the product. I have it for about two weeks and it does a very good job for now. I didn't noticed any negatives. I was suspicious about the no stains advertising but erasing it is almost effortless. Great job guys!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tas Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: Just right! I had a tiny freebie I was using and decided to get a larger version but they are not easy to find in the stores hence my online order. This arrived rolled up in a tube and I was able to use as soon as I unrolled it and peeled off the protective film. Note: the markers are the primary colors red, black, green and blue, not pastel colors as shown on the covers. A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: A. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great dry erase board with lots of good accessories
customer_reviews.text: This dry erase board really came in handy for us during our last Cruise to let family members not staying in our room know where we were at all times by leaving notes on the dry erase board, affixed to our metal door. The dry-erase board is thin but sticks to a magnetic surface easily and smoothly. The four pens with built-in erasers that came along with it worked wonderfully. The large rectangular eraser was also great for bigger jobs and had a magnet on the back. It all comes in a Handy heavy duty reusable storage tube. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: mom of five

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the cost of the items. This board fits perfect onto my freezer in my garage. We walk by it everyday and we needed a spot for notes and messages. This dry erase board combo gets the job done! My son loves that he can leave a note now to us on a daily basis. The markers and eraser are a nice added bonus as well. The stick right onto the freezer with ease. The board can be removed easily as well with little to no effort. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: cortezed

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Magnetic Dry Erase Whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: I measured the freezer door and found this is the perfect size. Remember to you have a door handle. Note: These can be cut with scissors if it's to big. For me, it is really great for to-do project list. The problem I have is that the markers are crap! Completely worthless. I went to my local office supply store & picked up a pack of 6 markers for less than $10. Yes, I still recommend this product. UPDATE: The company contacted me and asked about the produce BEFORE my review. They offered to replace the markers but I already did. CUSTOMER SERVICE GETS A 15 STAR RATING.
customer_reviews.author: RobertH

customer_reviews.title: Nice and white, even after repeated erasures and leaving messages for extended period.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a month and it fits exactly on the right side of my french door refrigerator. I've left notes up there for several weeks, and they still erase completely. Especially handy is the little magnetic eraser (even though each marker has an eraser sponge on the cap).....and the 2 little magnets that come with it are a cute "extra". I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yogini Linda

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but pens slip and eraser falls.
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying using this. We've had it for several months now and the only complaint is that the pens tend to slip down, so they need stronger magnets. I ended up putting other refrigerator magnets below the pens so they couldn't slip. Also the eraser fell off of the magnet backing several times, so I glued it back on. The board itself erases well and has not slipped at all. I wouldn't let the problems with the pens and eraser stop me from buying it, those problems were easily solved, although they should be made a little better to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent poduct!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size that stays on my fridge and doesn't budge. Love the convenience of having the accessories as part of the package. As described, ink from pens do not stain the board.
customer_reviews.author: Tsuki

customer_reviews.title: Overall, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I made this purchase because I struggle to forget daily tasks. I used to do the "hey google... set reminder for..." But Miss Google didn't want to remind me anymore.. I didn't want to rely on technology anymore and writing things down sometimes helps. And what better place to have the reminder than on the fridge, in the kitchen! A place where a mother's job is never done! It comes rolled up, so it does take a while for it to be able to fully stick to the fridge without trying to roll up, so the magnetic back is not actually all that sturdy. But after 24 hours it sure holds nicely! I am not feeling so old now!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: This small whiteboard is just what we needed, a place on the frig to write reminders or messages, nothing extensive. I read a few complaints about the board and included items, but I think they are fine. The markers write well, and the colors include a black one (the head of which is gray). There is a tiny magnet on the side of each one, with which you can stick it to the frig, as you can with the small board eraser, which also worked well. This whiteboard might also work for the inside of a school locker. It is a new item for me, and if my opinion changes after using it for some time, I will update.
customer_reviews.author: kendallzemp

customer_reviews.title: Space saver fridge white board !
customer_reviews.text: It’s a small enough to fit in among many pictures on our fridge and it’s not a thick bulky white board so it doesn’t slid down. The 5 colored pens that came with have magnet on the caps so you can stick on the board also although the magnet is a little weak. And the cap has also sponge for erasing the marker. I wonder... if we can buy just the pens when the marker ink ran out.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo mama

customer_reviews.title: White board
customer_reviews.text: This product is great but our mats do not work with general magnets. It won’t even hold the eraser it came with. It slides down. I ordered because we have little space and are using a make shift desk area for home schooling. Covid19 made our plans change and we were hoping it would work as more then a white board. It was why we choose this product. The markers and other items were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Adams

customer_reviews.title: ultimately pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months now and I can say I am ultimately pleased with the purchase. It's relatively easy to erase older messages with just the eraser. Even with the door opening and closing, the wobbly markers have yet to fall off the fridge, which is quite impressive. The only issue I had is that a day or two after I received it, one of the smaller erasers on the markers fell off. Also, before you purchase, if the colors matter to you, the ink doesn't match the color of the markers themselves - the ink is much darker.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional magnetic white board
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this magnetic board to hold greeting cards on my steel door (using magnetic push pins). I liked it so much, I bought a 2nd board. Between seasons, I'll use the markers to write inspirational messages or draw artwork to lift spirits. This board would also work great used on metal file cabinets for work notes. It can be cut to size too.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what me and my gf were looking for! We were looking for a way to have something on our fridge to track our progress at the gym and also write quotes for each day. The marker erasers are good and dont smudge when you erase with the provided eraser and also the marker eraser. One star off because the regular eraser's magnet fell off of mine :/ the marker tops are also a bit hard to take off (but they even tell you in a piece of paper that they already know and are looking into it!)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging, great instructions. Came with 5 colored markers and a magnetic eraser. Stuck on perfectly flat, wipes perfectly clean. Only tiny complaint...the magnets on the pens are a little weak. Otherwise, a real quality product! Also got a great discount code from their website. Will probably order another one. I seriously have no idea what people are complaining about unless they didn't test the magnetic quality of their refrigerator; or if they didn't peel off the protective film on the white board. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: s. gaines

customer_reviews.title: Very serviceable
customer_reviews.text: Came in a tube but relaxed quickly and stays flat on fridge door with no curling. Nice size, provides plenty of writing surface. I've only had it for a short while so can't comment on sturdiness or whether markers stain over time but meets expectations so far. The markers that come with it are kind of faint as noted in other reviews so i ordered a name brand set at the same time. The included markers do have magents which is handy while the more robust ones don't so there's a trade off, but the included set have a much smaller capacity and i expect they have a limited life span
customer_reviews.author: Louiseo56

customer_reviews.title: Good Dry Erase Board for Fridge
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to write out schedules and a shopping list for the family. It's large but not too large that it takes up too much space on the fridge. I was a bit worried that it would not adhere to the fridge I have and that the packaging might make it curl too much that it won't stay flat. But it actually stuck to it fairly well and the packaging didn't cause a permanent curl. The dry erase markers and eraser were pretty neat. We use it frequently and it hasn't dried out nor has the felt tip worn down at all. The happy-face magnet is a nice touch. I don't use it too often but it's still pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Msosing

customer_reviews.title: Functional AND beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I'm delighted with this magnetic white board. It lays flat and smooth. And the markers and eraser are also magnetic! Plus a cute little emoji magnet was included. I will use the white board to make grocery lists (it's on the fridge), and then snap a picture for an instant portable shopping list - no paper. LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.author: S. Tracey

customer_reviews.title: I have gotten worse. I needed get on a better schedule and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm an out of sight out of mind kind of person and since having a baby, I have gotten worse. I needed get on a better schedule and really just get things organized, and the fact that this can go on the fridge and I see it all the time has greatly helped me. I am beyond happy with this dry erase board and no longer need to hang my old ones up. The markers work great too and I like that we are given 4 of them and an extra eraser! One of my favorite purchases and I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Nay Hubb

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to keep on my fridge as a running shopping list I can just snap a photo of and go off to the store. This allows us to right away write something down as soon as we realize it we need it. This also saves paper which I love because I am trying to be a bit more green! It came exactly as shown in the photo. I only keep one marker on the fridge and i put away the rest. I will replace as they dry out so this set lasts me longer!
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: Simple, stylish, and durable
customer_reviews.text: I like that the back side is magnetized entirely, that it can be easily repositioned. We've had boards in metal frames before that became repeatedly unstuck from the fridge as the door was opened and hit the floor, breaking the frame several times over. This is a bit pricey but seems like it will last a few years. I also appreciate that the pens are multicolored and magnetized so they're always on the board when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why I didn’t replace my 20 year old whiteboard sooner
customer_reviews.text: I have been avoiding the replacement of my college whiteboard for years. The frame finally broke down completely, so here we are. I wish I had bought this sooner. I love that it’s a full magnet piece. Very good hold on my fridge. I selected a size small which is perfect for my family to use as a menu board and family to do list. The markers that came with it are great too. I love that they are magnetic, so no looking for where you left the marker.
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnati momma

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: When I first unraveled this from the tube packaging I was a little concerned the magnetic underside would not be strong enough to stick to my refrigerator, especially as my refrigerator has a textured finish. However, I was surprised as this sticks great and does not move. Does exactly as advertised. The magnetic markers and board erasers are also great. They stay on the door as we open/close the refrigerator. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: So perfect we ordered 2 more
customer_reviews.text: We have had other magnetic white boards and either they don't stay or you can't get the ink off them after a couple of days. This white board is the perfect size for what we need, stays in place, and very easily wipes off. After the first one came in we ordered 2 more. Now we have one for our projects, our grocery list, and an extra we just use for monthly reminders.... i.e. birthdays, trips, holidays etc. The kit comes with different colored pens and an eraser that are all magnetic as well so they sit on the fridge right next to the board. No more looking for the pen or eraser in the junk drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyann

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping a running grocery list
customer_reviews.text: This board had been a huge help in my house! We’re a family of four and it’s a task to try and hunt everyone down on the days that I go to the store and see who needs what. With this board I just keep it on the fridge and everyone can write down what they need. I snap a picture of it before I leave for the store. If they forget to write it on the board, they don’t get it! It sticks the refrigerator and wipes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: snb7485

customer_reviews.title: Need to leave reminder notes for my all too forgetful family
customer_reviews.text: Tired of repeating yourself or people leaving little paper notes all around? Time to buy this whiteboard for your refrigerator. It’s a nice way to leave notes & reminders, store lists or menus, and kids schedules. It’s a nice size, the markers work better than I expected and it’s erases easily without leaving any permanent marks. Everybody could use this and with my growing forgetfulness I could use one in every room.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A Russell

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my parents after my wife and I have used like products for years. We place on the fridge and as we discover things we need we write them on the board. I take a picture of the list with my phone since I have a habit of leaving the board at the store. My wife still carries the board with her. Also, sometimes you will accidentally brush the board and wipe off part of your list.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Richards

customer_reviews.title: Incredible whiteboard!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best whiteboard I have ever purchased, seriously!!! I’m a busy working mom and I depend on having whiteboards on the fridge for family to-do lists, upcoming appointments and shopping lists. Most whiteboards magnets are not that strong and end up falling off the fridge. The surface ends up ghosting with previous writings and the only way to have a clean surface is using that stinky whiteboard cleaning spray. This magnetic dry erase board is ingenious. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Seda

customer_reviews.title: Love! Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Love! Finally a dry erase board that actually works! No ghosting, markers work well, the magnetic backing is strong and the pens and eraser work perfectly. I use it to remind me of things to pick up from the grocery store as we run out, and for appointment reminders.
customer_reviews.author: jc_moski

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I really like and frequently use Google Keep Notes to have access to lists from any one of a dozen different devices, but there are times when I want to track progress on list of items without have to pick up or sit down in front of a device. This on the side of my refrigerator where I can't help but see it every time I leave the house or am preparing a meal is perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: tledford

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: This board is exactly what I needed and works great. The entire material is magnetic so it’s very sturdy and I love that it came with different colored markers. It’s also great that each marker has a little eraser attached to it to erase with precision. The board also comes with a separate bigger eraser if you need to erase the whole board. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: eyerisfgr

customer_reviews.title: Super handy. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I was being tutored in my home last weekend, and a statement was made that she wished the chalk board was here. I decided to give this mag Eric dry erase board a try. I think she'll be pleased with this. I know I am so far! Love that the markers and eraser are also magnetic❤..and a variety of colors. I appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Zaria aziza

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to write out my dinner menu for the week so that I’m only buying the groceries that I need on sundays. Markers write well. A bit light but the easer on the tips of each marker is a useful touch. Easy to remove from fridge and stick back on. Holds onto the metal fridge very well. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a magnet dry erase board.
customer_reviews.author: TMAlexander

customer_reviews.title: Perfect board for fridge
customer_reviews.text: We love this magnetic board for our fridge. It’s excellent quality and the size is perfect. Before deciding on this one, I had compared about six different boards and this was the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Swimh20polo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job!
customer_reviews.text: A good dry erase is critical in my house and trying to find one that was large enough for the fridge and actually stayed on it without damaging my fridge was hard. This is a moldable one piece of magnet with the dry erase on it. It fits wonderfully and if finally large enough. Good thing is they make even larger ones too if I need one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Boymom4

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put up on the fridge. It has excellent magnetic properties. We added some washi tape so we can separate out different categories (to buy, to do, notes) for our busy family. I love the size. The eraser and markers are perfect. Markers are a fine print which I prefer. I take a picture of the to buy side for shopping before I head to the grocery store. Nice and easy
customer_reviews.author: PurifiedCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Good for grocery list on fridge
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the side of my fridge. I was sick of wasting paper with my grocery lists, this is exactly what I needed. Now I write out my list, take a picture on my phone and I’m good to go. Comes with 5 nice dry erase markers and a magnetic eraser. I put it on the black side of my fridge vs the stainless steel front based off of others reviews on it leaving marks. Haven’t had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: mmancc11399

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why so many people find this difficult to erase. If you just read the directions and remove the clear plastic film from the front of the board before you use it, there is no problem. If anything, it erases almost too easily! Just accidentally brushing up against it erases it. Other than that, it is perfect for the purpose. I have it on the front of my freezer so I can keep track of the freezer contents. The eraser and the colored pens stick to the freezer door next to the magnetic board and have not fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical, but love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that it wouldn't unroll and be able to stick on fridge. But I was completely wrong. It works perfectly and no problem with it being flat on our fridge. The pens are great and they erase smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: leahlouisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice board ..Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Received my item today and markers where completely dry the board itself is really nice and sticks to the fridge with no problem but I don’t think I should have paid what I did for just the white board and dried up markers Update : I got in contact with customer service and like magic they sent a new set with working markers !! I am so happy with the amazing service!
customer_reviews.author: Marsy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome whiteboard!
customer_reviews.text: Grew bought the 12x8 whiteboard and we love it. It’s a good size for basic usage. We put it on the fridge to remind us what we have and what we need for the next time we do groceries. Magnets for the whiteboard, markers and eraser are strong. Nothing has ever fallen from the refrigerator. We are very pleased. Look no further, this is a good choice!
customer_reviews.author: CptnWhirlpool

customer_reviews.title: Best whiteboard around!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!! I've had so many whiteboards over the years but this truly is a marvel. I have 6 kids so the fridge is the command center of the home. The menu, grocery list, schedule, reminders, to do list, etc. I got a large one and we use it fully. During the holidays I wrote our Thanksgiving and Christmas menus on it, partly for the guests and partly to remind myself what I was preparing! Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertise - waste of money
customer_reviews.text: it does not adhere to any metal or magnetic card, photos, or even marker with magnet that came along. Pointless, such a hassle! I had this problem 2x now, thinking that this time it would not be an issue. I was wrong. I am a physical therapist with 4 children and would like something that help to organize my children schedules efficiently - but unfortunately not!
customer_reviews.author: Veho

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: It was a little stiff when I unrolled it, so I placed it on my refrigerator. Magnetic adhesion was good. It stuck without any problems, but was not completely flat at the edges. I smoothed it with my hands and left it. It was completely flat in a few hours. The accessories worked fine. Markers worked okay. Eraser worked well. The fact that they are also magnetized is convenient. It cleans up well. I haven't had any issues with incomplete erasing. The price wasn't the lowest, but I think the quality was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: as drscribed, a great little feature came as a pleasant surprise, the markers have a small magnet to easilt attach to the whiteboard, there is a great small eraser also magnetic for ease in keeping it on the whiteboard where it is needed. large enough that I cut a smallsection to use on another babinet. really great quality item would not hesitate to reorder if in need.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know I needed this until I saw it! Lol this is a GREAT dry erase board. I ended up ordering one for my boyfriend as well but it’s as described. I would order another one if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Using this for a few months now
customer_reviews.text: And it's perfect! I'm a really forgetful person, so whenever I need to remember anything in the kitchen, I write it down! Right now it's mostly to-do and to-buy lists, with the occasional doodle from my husband. It's got a sturdy magnet, it erases just fine, and it doesn't have any weird, peeling, bunched up plastic over the surface like some whiteboards I've bought before.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Agudo

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about this when my wife put it in the cart. I expected it to be flimsy and cheap. To my surprise, it was quite the opposite. It attached to the Fridge quite well and is securely in place with absolutely no curling at the corners or sides. The pens are decent too and our other dry erase pens work just fine too. The large(ish) eraser is a nice addition to it. The markers wipe off with ease and it's getting a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger88

customer_reviews.title: Today’s Whiteboard! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the old fashioned white board where you would write something then spend the next week trying to scrub it off only to have marks left! I was hesitating because it was a little more expensive but I am so glad I purchased this. It is sleek and I can write a whole Weeks menu plan, things I need to buy at the store on the other side. It come with markers and an eraser. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for the fridge, lovely colours, easy to wipe clean - exactly what I needed. One small thing - perhaps the kokis could have a bigger magnet, I knock them off onto the floor and I now only keep 2 out? I have mine on the side of the fridge, but on the door I think they could fall off it the door is jerked open.
customer_reviews.author: D Volek

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product but scratches very easily
customer_reviews.text: I love it, everything about it. The only thing is, it scratches very easily, so keeping it vertical, rather then horizontal (like on a counter or some other surface where it might get scratched by pots and pans), and erasing it using only the spangle provided with it, is the best way to keep it looking new longer
customer_reviews.author: Luda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fridge whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for what I was looking for - a thin white board to put on the bridge. No issues with the magnet working on my fridge but it was nice to get a message from the seller in advance that should there be an issue, they're happy to accept the return. The white board has ample space to write on and no issues with erasing anything I've written on it so far. All the markers that come with the board work great and the magnetic eraser is a great touch too.
customer_reviews.author: aahhh

customer_reviews.title: Great white board
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me refrigerator. The colors work and are magnetic markers with their own erasers. It also comes with a magnetic eraser. I'm very happy with my purchase. My son wanted this to put what he wanted us to buy from the food store and for us to write what we bought so he knew what was in the fruit and veggie drawers. :)
customer_reviews.author: DRS

customer_reviews.title: Good product- large for the fridge.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the caps of the pens are impossibly hard to get off the first time or two. My solution was to get a different pen to go along with those included in this item. The eraser works well- and not all do, in my experience. The size of the white board is pretty large- I'll probably end up cutting it into two pieces eventually. For now though, one half is the family menu and the other a to-do list. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Macneil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the fridge
customer_reviews.text: This frameless magnetic whiteboard is much better than the framed versions I've had before. It clings better and is easy to clean. The magnetic markers don't cling as strongly, but I have a magnetic container to corral those, plus some others I had, and an eraser. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Compulsive Reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy, nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Love the magnetic markers. easy on/easy off. whiteboard has thin film to remove before using. Using on my refrigerator. Got tired of the "liquic chalk" boards -- always shaking those pens and most seem to leak. SO, this is great. using for shopping list, to do list. easy to take a pic w/phone when running out for errands.
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Markers are a problem if you are very young or older or arthritic
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great size. Sticks beautifully. Big problem with markers though. Caps are very hard to get off. I bought this for my 92 year old father and I can hardly get the caps off. There is a note acknowledging this problem enclosed with the package but will they send replacement markers since they clearly know it's a problem. Now I have to go buy whiteboard markers with magnets which adds to the cost of this.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love the packaging and the set up ease. It comes with everything you need and sticks flat to the fridge. It wipes clean easily. The only reason I gave 4 stars was the magnet fell off one pen as soon as I tried to set it up. It did not prevent use and its not that bog of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Elynoon

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Great so far. We had a little dry-erase board that we stuck to the fridge, but the magnets eventually came loose from the back and it crashed to the floor several times. This one stays where it's supposed to be, and is sleeker looking. It erases just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic white board with its magnetic markers and eraser is convenient and easy to use. We keep it on the refrigerator, listing what it is our freezer. Having the eraser and markers right there make it so easy to add or delete items as we put them into or take them out of the freezer. No more digging through the freezer to see what's there!
customer_reviews.author: Mom-Mom

customer_reviews.title: As good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this to write notes about meal planning and expiration dates on my refrigerator. I’m impressed with the quality of the materials and pens. The smallest size is big enough for that purpose, but I love it so much that I am considering buying a larger one for the side of my refrigerator for other art and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Every once in awhile a product or Company comes along where you say, yep, they get it. First off, great product at a great price. works better than any white board product I've ever used. Top that off with Customer Service that understands what their job is and what's not to like. They say Yuc, I say Yum (Oh yeah that Company names already taken)
customer_reviews.author: Joe Blow

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is one the best things I've ever purchase for my home organization. The base sticks to the refrigerator magnetically, and the eraser and pens do as well. They've holding up really well, and I'd recommend this to anyone looking for a dry erase board for home organization.
customer_reviews.author: ATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great size & quality, handy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this whiteboard, great size for my fridge, lays flat, doesn't scratch the fridge when I move it. My kids and I use it to leave notes for each other or I leave instructions for them or the babysitter. Great for to-do lists as well. The magnetic eraser is really handy and just the right size. The magnetic markers are good but the caps are very hard to remove, we just use regular dry erase makers kept on the side. The bonus fridge magnets didn't add anything , cheap, peeling, and weak. But the main product has been great, just what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my garage freezer. It lays completely flat on the the front of my freezer door and is easy to write and erase on. I love being able to keep track of all the food in the freezer. Highly recommend. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Fridge
customer_reviews.text: My housemates and I needed a board to write on and this looks great! It just rolls onto the fridge as long as your fridge is magnetic. A good rule of thumb is that if you can stick a magnet to the fridge, this board will work just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Seda L.

customer_reviews.title: Love the board. Perfect size for sticking on refrigerator.
customer_reviews.text: The board is excellent quality. It is portable, and roll-away. Comes with different color markers with built in eraser as well as a separate big eraser. Each of these stick very well on the refrigerator. Worth the cost. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Naveen

customer_reviews.title: BEST magnetic whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: Really like this magnetic board and pens/eraser included in the pack! Very nice, high quality product, and so versatile! Its sturdy and cleans well. It’s great that it comes in different sizes. We are already considering buying another one. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Great little whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fridge whiteboard. I am using it to write what freezer meals are in there so I'm not digging through everything all the time. The markers could use a little more magnetic strength, but they do stay up if you get them in the right position.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J

customer_reviews.title: NOT stain proof!
customer_reviews.text: NOT “stain proof”. I used the markers that were included in the package. Used the eraser. Tried again go erase with dry paper towel and still not coming clean. I’m sure spray will shorten the life of the gloss. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: BearMama3

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We put ours on the fridge and have been using it for a while. It cleans easily without leaving any residue. It was reasonably priced and arrived ahead of the scheduled date, which is saying something since we live in the boonies.
customer_reviews.author: K in MC

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to make my grocery trips more efficient and less frequent, this helps when it's used as we run out of an item. Unfortunately, training some family members has proved a bit of a challenge. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.K.

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this wonderful board - it could not please me more. Just the right size, not conspicuous but large enough. Stays in place - no unnecessary "frame" to get in the way. I just love this little board!
customer_reviews.author: Ann P. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping track of mom's pain meds, dr appts, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents after my mom was diagnosed with cancer so we could keep track of what and when she needs certain medications, doctor and home health care appointments, etc. It has been a lifesaver for my dad.
customer_reviews.author: Grace4today

customer_reviews.title: It looks good on my fridge
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months no and have no complaints. It looks good on my fridge, writes and erases well, and is overall just a nice product. One pen was dry when I got it, but it's easy enough to buy more if I need them. I would absolutely buy this again or recommend it to someone looking for a dry-erase board.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Vinsant

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need for freezer or fridge.
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these, one for the fridge and one for the outside freezer. We keep track of how many of each kind of meat, frozen veggies and pizzas are present. This magnetic board is very thin and fits snugly against the side of the freezer. We did not want the kind of white board that had sides like a picture frame. This suited our needs exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of Hearts

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I think this dry erase board is a great addition to anyone’s kitchen refrigerator. We use ours to keep a to do list for around the house as well as other notes. It comes rolled up and take a little bit to get it flattened and ready for mounting on the refrigerator. It cleans nicely with the included eraser, however, have only used the included markers. If you use different markers it may not clean as nicely. All-in-all a nice addition to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Burke

customer_reviews.title: Good Service
customer_reviews.text: Originally the magnet on the large black eraser did not stick onto the refrigerator door. I complained to the vendor and he sent me a new eraser which sticks fine. He was very solicitous which I appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard M. Sklar

customer_reviews.title: Meets an important need
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter who is a second grade school teacher. She uses it in her remote "classroom" to aid her in presenting material to her virtual students. It is easily cleaned for repeated uses for a variety of subjects. Just what she needed to aid her in the role of virtual teacher.
customer_reviews.author: VA Creeper

customer_reviews.title: Lives Up to the Hype
customer_reviews.text: This is the *perfect* size for our fridge, and the magnetic markers it comes with are actually pretty nice! Absolutely no issues writing or erasing on this so far. Beautiful, easy to add to the kitchen, and super helpful for grocery lists etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great refrigerator magnet for grocery lists!!
customer_reviews.text: My old board stained and was super hard to get the marker writing off. I have only had this for a little while, mind you, but already I love this board! I tested it out by leaving writing on it for several days and it still wiped off clean! Have yet to find out if it will still do that after several weeks or a month, though. So far, I really like it! And it came with two cute little magnets:)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described. My old whiteboard's magnets didn't cover enough surface. Everytime I would clean it, it would fall off the fridge, because of my fridge door being curved. This 100% stays exactly where I put it. Best purchase of the day!
customer_reviews.author: Paulette D Mogan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, unrolls easy, and wipes clean
customer_reviews.text: Great fridge (or other magnetic surface) whiteboard. I bought mine to handle my weekly shopping to stop me from making multiple trips because i forgot something. Best thing i can say is that the marker wipes clean with no hazy ghosts, even after leaving writing up for 2+ weeks. Also, being a thin magnet and whiteboard combo makes this mount flat against the surface, limiting the chance for something to knock it off the fridge. Great product and will recommend to family/friends
customer_reviews.author: WaywardSamurai

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good value.
customer_reviews.text: Everything pretty much works as advertised. Almost the exact size I was looking for. Stuck to the fridge with no issue. Cleans easily. And it comes with a number of markers. Fortunately there really isn't anything to complain about. 4 out of 5...only because I usually save 5's for blow-your-mind purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Gluck

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to my stainless fridge and a very handy product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this fits nicely on my fridge and I can keep track of the allergy shots I’m currently giving one of my horses, and my hubby and I can leave notes for each other. Love it!! Oh! And the eraser and pens are all magnetic and right where you need them.
customer_reviews.author: Junipersue

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Fast
customer_reviews.text: I really like this idea. Out of the tube and up on the fridge in less than a minute. No need to mess up the walls with nails or sticky velcro attachers. Nice touch that the pens and the eraser also have magnets. The only issue I have had is the board doesn't erase as cleanly as others I have used. I used alcohol on a paper towel to solve the problem and wahla, clean board.
customer_reviews.author: Howard A.

customer_reviews.title: It’s bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The markers first thing I had trouble with is trying to get them open to write I thought you had to press something but I figured out you pull them the tops are the the black part where the magnet and eraser are
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great response from seller to correct problem!
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the whiteboard and thought it was defective. The marker left a stain on the board. The seller immediately contacted me after reading my negative review and it turns out their was a film on the whiteboard that was not removed. Once removed, it worked great. The seller was very quick to respond. Now I am completely satisfied with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Rita M. Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: DOLL UP YOUR FRIDGE
customer_reviews.text: Only had the product one day. Works and looks as described on line. Easy as pie to open the cannister, flatten out the magnetic sheet and put on the fridge. Good pen selection and large mag eraser. BE SURE TO REMEMBER TO REMOVE THE THIN FILM COVERING THE BOARD SURFACE!!
customer_reviews.author: william j sanders

customer_reviews.title: still new but super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: use it for shopping list on side of free standing microwave (fridge too full of grandkids artwork). I wish it was in a magnetic frame like my old one as it would be sturdier, but otherwise good product so far
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: I love that the white board is thin and flexible
customer_reviews.text: I love that the white board is thin and flexible. It doesn't fall off the fridge if the door is slammed either. My husband said the other day that this is what we've needed for awhile. And for the price of white board and pens it was totally worth it. The only issue I've found is that the decorations (smiley face and quote) on the magnets are peeling off after only a few weeks, but I didn't buy it for the magnets so it doesn't bother me. For clarifications I thought the red marker looked pink in the photos but its red and the blue isn't as light as it looks in the photos either. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Trudeau

customer_reviews.title: Well it did not stick to my S/S Fridge
customer_reviews.text: However, it really is a nice little magnetic sheet, and easily goes on the fridge side (where it isn;t stainless) Very smooth writing, Included accessories work well. Would give it 5 stars if it stuck to the stainless, but my fridge (KitchenAid) apparently has 0 magnetic attraction
customer_reviews.author: C.S

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Greatly surprise with the quality of this product. It came in a cylinder shaped box with a beautiful design that protected the board, markers and eraser.. Also, it came with 2 magnetic pins that look really nice on the whiteboard. Planning to buy a second one as my kid loves to draw on it and I need another one for my grocery list!
customer_reviews.author: Eddison Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Seamless!! Lays flat on the fridge!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. Packaging was professional and sturdy. Comes with roll up white board that opens up easily and lays flat on magnetic fridge surface, a few dry erase markers, eraser and magnetic smiley. Very easy to install and use. Marker caddy displayed in pic not included.
customer_reviews.author: Shara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for posting schedules!
customer_reviews.text: The magnetic backing makes this much easier to set up and can be moved to another location if needed. It doesn't have a metal-like border to impede the visual area and doesn't have to mounted on the wall. Just slap it onto a metal surface and it's good to go. I did come packaged Rolled Up in a tube, which, we had to roll backwards and leave to straighten it out - and the extreme edges are a little lumpy, and doesn't make complete contact all the way around. I'm sure in time it will settle all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: This will stick magnetically to something but magnets will NOT stick to it.
customer_reviews.text: It does what they say it will but I wanted to use magnets to attach papers to IT and that will not work. Sadly, I had already cut it to fit before I found that out. $40 lost. Otherwise, if you wanted to use it to slap on your fridge it would be perfect. Also easy to cut to size.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Kliner

customer_reviews.title: What's for dinner??
customer_reviews.text: I love this little white board. I had it on the front of the fridge, but moved it to the side because it was getting bumped and erased. Used as a menu board to keep me organized.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Dennis

customer_reviews.title: great organization
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to our fridge. There is plenty of room to organize. We have our weekly dinner, lunches, snacks and a shopping list all included. It comes with multiple colors of pens and a good quality eraser.
customer_reviews.author: brea

customer_reviews.title: Board is great.  Markers, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Great white board. Nice and thin. We did have to put strong magnets on side to flatten down for a few days, as it comes rolled up. Only reason for 4 stars is that markers aren't that great and magnets on those are pretty weak.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

product_meta.title: Magnetic Dry Erase Whiteboard Sheet for Fridge 17x11 inch with New Stain Resistant Technology - 6 Sizes - White Board for Refrigerator - Kitchen Whiteboard - Refrigerator Magnets
feature_bullets: ✅ 1 YEAR WARRANTY - NEW PREMIUM MATERIAL - STAIN RESISTANT - NO WRINKLES - EASY TO ERASE - The dry erase white board has been successfully tested for 100K write-erase cycles. It is covered with special coating and can be easily erased even after 30 days. We offer a 1 year warranty on the board surface and we guarantee it will keep it's properties in time.

✅ HARD GRIP - NO CREASES - EASY TO HANDLE - The magnetic whiteboard has strong grip on steel surfaces and because of it's thickness it does not to make creases when handled. The frigde white board can hold magnetic items when placed on the refrigerator, freezer or other metal surface, and because of it's nicely finished rounded corners it can be easily removed. Is is very flexible, and easy to fit on the fridge.

✅ VALUE PACK - ALL MAGNETIC - STRONG TUBE - Includes high quality writing tools (1 black, 1 red, 1 orange, 1 green and 1 blue) and a large magnetic eraser. All packaged in a nicely designed and strong tube to be protected on their journey.

✅ MULTIPURPOSE USE - GROCERY LIST - TO DO LIST - CHORE LIST - SHOPPING LIST - DRAWING BOARD - OFFICE BOARD - DAILY MENU PLANNER - CALENDAR - SCHEDULER - FRIDGE ORGANIZER - MESSAGE BOARD - MAGNETIC WHITEBOARD FOR REFRIGERATOR
⚠️ Please make sure your fridge can support magnetic items before placing the order! Before usage, please remove the thin protective film from the front of the white board!

specifications.Material Type: Magnetized plastic with dry erase coating
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,468 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
